<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" tools:context=".EmiCalcActivity" android:background="@color/background_light" >
<!-- Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="60dp"
android:textSize="28sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center"
android:text="Mortgage Calculator" android:textColor="@color/white" android:background="@color/title_background"
app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.0" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.0" />
<!-- Mortgage Amount Input --> <EditText android:id="@+id/mortgageAmountInput" android:layout_width="350dp" android:layout_height="50dp"
android:textColor="@color/black"
android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="32dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp"
android:hint="Mortgage Amount" android:inputType="numberDecimal" android:background="@color/white" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textView" />
<!-- Term Input --> <EditText android:id="@+id/termInput" android:layout_width="350dp" android:layout_height="50dp"
android:textColor="@color/black"
android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp"
android:hint="Term (years)" android:background="@color/white" android:inputType="number" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/mortgageAmountInput" />
<!-- Interest Rate Input --> <EditText android:id="@+id/interestRateInput" android:layout_width="350dp" android:layout_height="50dp"
android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp"
android:hint="Interest Rate (%)"
android:background="@color/white" android:textColor="@color/black"
android:inputType="numberDecimal" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/termInput" />
<!-- Amortization period Input --> <EditText android:id="@+id/amortizationPeriodInput" android:layout_width="350dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp"
android:hint="Amortization Period (years)"
android:background="@color/white" android:textColor="@color/black"
android:inputType="number" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/interestRateInput" />
<!-- Payment Frequency Select --> <Spinner android:id="@+id/paymentFrequencySpinner" android:layout_width="350dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp"
app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/amortizationPeriodInput"
android:background="@color/white" android:textColor="@color/black"
/>
<!-- Calculate Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/calculateButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
android:text="Calculate" android:backgroundTint="@color/button_color" android:textColor="@color/white"
app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/paymentFrequencySpinner" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="parent" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:id="@+id/resultTextView" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="18sp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/paymentFrequencySpinner" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" android:text="Your EMI will be displayed here" android:clickable="false" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" tools:context=".EmiCalcActivity" android:background="@color/background_light" >
<!-- Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="60dp" android:textSize="28sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" android:text="Mortgage Calculator" android:textColor="@color/white" android:background="@color/title_background" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Mortgage Amount Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/mortgageAmountTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:text="Mortgage Amount" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textView" />
<!-- Mortgage Amount Input --> <EditText android:id="@+id/mortgageAmountInput" style="@style/CustomEditTextStyle" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:hint="Enter mortgage amount" android:inputType="numberDecimal" android:autofillHints="creditCardNumber" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/mortgageAmountTitle" />
<!-- Interest Rate Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/interestRateTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="Interest Rate (%)" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/mortgageAmountInput" />
<!-- Interest Rate Input --> <EditText android:id="@+id/interestRateInput" style="@style/CustomEditTextStyle" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:hint="Enter interest rate" android:inputType="numberDecimal" android:autofillHints="off" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/interestRateTitle" />
<!-- Amortization Period Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/amortizationPeriodTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="Amortization Period (years)" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/interestRateInput" />
<!-- Amortization period Input --> <EditText android:id="@+id/amortizationPeriodInput" style="@style/CustomEditTextStyle" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:hint="Enter amortization period" android:inputType="number" android:autofillHints="off" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/amortizationPeriodTitle" />
<!-- Payment Frequency Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/paymentFrequencyTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="Payment Frequency" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/amortizationPeriodInput" />
<!-- Payment Frequency Select --> <Spinner android:id="@+id/paymentFrequencySpinner" style="@style/CustomEditTextStyle" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/paymentFrequencyTitle" />
<!-- Calculate Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/calculateButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginStart="32dp" android:layout_marginTop="32dp" android:layout_marginEnd="32dp" android:text="Calculate EMI" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:backgroundTint="@color/title_background" android:elevation="8dp" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:strokeColor="@color/black" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/paymentFrequencySpinner" />
<!-- Result Text --> <TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:id="@+id/resultTextView" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" android:padding="16dp" android:background="@color/white" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/calculateButton" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" android:text="Your EMI will be displayed here" android:clickable="false" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
